meanings.definition: A person engaged in or ready to engage in combat.
meanings.sent1: The brave combatant stood ready for battle.
meanings.sent2: The two combatants clashed swords in the arena.
meanings.sent3: The young combatant tripped over his own feet during training.
meanings.sent4: Her determination made her a fierce combatant in the debate.
meanings.sent5: The veteran combatant shared war stories with the new recruits.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to combat or combatants.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers wore combatant uniforms for the mission.
meanings.sent2: The combatant strategy proved successful in the field.
meanings.sent3: The combatant mindset helped him overcome challenges.
meanings.sent4: Her combatant spirit inspired her teammates to push harder.
meanings.sent5: The combatant training prepared them for any situation.
